skillTree.localised_description: "I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."
Like all nasty skulkers, dis Boss is "a bad piece o' work" – when he stabs he really means it.
"Betcha ya expected da high blow! Ha!"
You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.
"Drink da red venom an' sleep now, soft-'ead."
Nothing of a true Spider's slow and patient trapping technique, and all of Snagla's flair for... well, everything that the aforementioned is not!
As sharp as Fangspike, it scrambles the brains of all who hear it. If poison were a sound, it would be *this* sound.

skillTree.localised_description: It is easy to dismiss the Forest Goblins' Spider-god as a hallucination. Arachnaroks rampaging across a battlefield are not quite as easily dismissed, however.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Spider Hatchlings

skillTree.localised_description: It is when Snagla's eyes go dull that his murderous instincts become sharpest.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Born under the Drakwald's canopy and nursed in the Black Pit's depths, Snagla can ask even a tree-leaf's shadow to accommodate his murderous skulking, and it will oblige.
Some Forest Goblins have been known to take it willingly to induce dreams of the Spider-god. Their enemies take it most unwillingly, to induce lethargy and death.

skillTree.localised_description: Snagla’s mob has a penchant for the feathers worn by Empire troops, which they soak in their slaughtered owners’ blood and place upon their weapons and shields.

skillTree.localised_description: A warlike army's journey to a pile of peacefully rotting mulch goes through the forests where the Deff Creepers lie in wait.

skillTree.localised_description: "Toof-spider likez tuff meat, likez tender meat, likez your meat!"

	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

items.colour_text: A mercifully swift attack, should the victim happen to die at once; otherwise, it's unmercifully debilitating, exposing one to Snagla's wails at ear-shattering range to boot.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +20% chance of wounding aggressors

item_set.name: Spider God's Gifts
item_set.description: Snagla Grobspit fashioned these deadly weapons from the remains of the Redvenom tribe's Arachnarok Spider at the behest of the Spider God itself!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

items.colour_text: It is a fang that is a spike, made into a spear. As weaponcraft goes, it follows Goblin guidelines: quick and dirty; used likewise.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A rising legend amongst the Forest Goblins, Snagla Grobspit is at the forefront of every Greenskin victory.
